```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Define the cards data
cards <- list(
  list(
    header = "Interactive Maps",
    body1 = card_body(
      "This is the first body section of card 1"
    ),
    body2 = NULL
  ),
  list(
    header = "Card 2",
    body1 = card_body(
    "This is the first body section of card 2"
    ),
    body2 = card_body(
      "This is the second body section of card 2"
    )
  ),
  list(
    header = "Card 3",
    body1 = card_body(
      "This is the first body section of card 3"
    ),
    body2 = card_body(
      "This is the second body section of card 3"
    )
  )
)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Update the card 1 data with the map widget
cards[[1]]$body1 <- map_widget()
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Render the slideshow
htmltools::browsable(
  tags$html(
    tags$head(
      # Use Bootstrap 5
      tags$link(
        rel = "stylesheet",
        href = "https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/5.0.0-alpha1/css/bootstrap.min.css"
      ),
      # Add some custom CSS for the animations
      card_animation()
    ),
    tags$body(
      slideshow(cards)
    )
  )
)
```
